document_data.name: Zay
document_data.mainbody:
'''Zay''' was one of the [[phaerimm]]s that dwelled beneath the [[Greycloak Hills]] and was released from imprisonment from beyond the [[Sharn Wall]] during the early days of the [[Return of the Archwizards (event)|Return of the Archwizards]] saga.

{{Quote|The others have screamed their throats raw and told you nothing. First we must break their will. Only then will they tell us the words.|Zay, to [[Tha]].}}
document_data.Personality: Like other phaerimms in the WarGather, Zay was a malicious being.
document_data.Activities: Zay was wholly dedicated to bypassing the magical defenses of [[Evereska]] to consume the ''[[mythal]]'' within.
document_data.History:
After being released in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}, Zay, [[Tha]], and the other phaerimm in the WarGather captured a group of Evereskan warriors and [[Elven high mage|high mages]] that sought to repair the damage done to the Sharn Wall. Notable among them were Tomb Master [[Kiinyon Colbathin]] and Lord [[Gervas Imesfor]]. Zay tortured and ridiculed the elven captives in order to attain more information about how to gain access to Evereska.

A short time later a group led by [[Melegaunt Tanthul]] descended into the phaerimm's underground lair to rescue the elves. During the raid, Zay was slain by the [[Vaasan]] warrior [[Vala Thorsdotter]], wielder of a magical ''[[darksword]]''.
